title: Equip your special weapon
description:
Each character has a "special weapon."

"Special Weapons" is available on the character details screen.
You can check the weapon proficiency level (WM).

Check your "special weapons"
Let's equip it!

title: Make weapon proficiency (WM) level 5
description:
Weapon Proficiency (WM)
Equip weapons and go around the stage,
It can be strengthened by using statues.

Improved weapon proficiency,
When equipped with the weapon in question
The weapon's parameters will increase.

Furthermore, when weapon proficiency reaches a certain level,
Learn weapon techniques.

title: Make your special move LV5
description:
With a special move set
Do you want to go around the stage or
Using secret books of techniques,
Let's make your special move LV5!

Special moves are strengthened
The power and effects of special moves have been enhanced,
Consumption SP will also be reduced.

title: Learn magic skills
description:
Wands and monster magic weapons
Improved weapon proficiency (WM)
You can learn "magic techniques."

"Magic Techniques" differ from other weapon types.
Even if you don't have a wand or monster magic weapon
Can be used.

title: Let's set up a magic skill
description:
The settings for magic moves can be found on the character details screen.
You can set it by changing your special move.

Magical techniques are wands or monster magic weapons
It has an icon.

"Magic Techniques" differ from other weapon types.
Even if you don't have a wand or monster magic weapon
Can be used.

title: Increase your magic skill to LV5
description:
Set up a magic move and go around the stage,
Using secret books of techniques,
Strengthen your magic move to LV5.

When you strengthen your magic moves
The power and effects of magical techniques have been enhanced,
Consumption SP will also be reduced.

title: Let's go to level 500
description:
When you clear the stage,
Experience points can be obtained for each character.

By obtaining a constant amount of experience points,
The character level increases.

When the level increases, the character's parameters increase.
You can acquire unique skills.

title: Allocate mana
description:
Mana allocation
From "Mana Allocation" in "Mao's Lab"
You can do it.

Mana can be obtained with every reincarnation,
By allocating that mana,
Ability cheats and weapon proficiency (WM)
Maximum level increases.

With mana allocation
Strengthen your characters to your liking!

title: Let's awaken
description:

You can "awakening."

If you increase the number of ★,
